body.name: COOFANDY Men's Cotton Linen Shirts Casaul Short Sleeve Button Down Summer Beach Dress Shirt
features: Breathable Fabric: COOFANDY men's linen shirts are made of high-quality linen fabric, which is comfortable and breathable, keeps the body dry, and is very suitable for summer wear.

Casual style: COOFANDY men's linen short-sleeved button-down shirt have a streamlined design, summer beach casual style, comfortable and breathable fabric , ultra-light and portable, simple and elegant, suitable for various occasions.

Hidden buttons: COOFANDY men's linen shirts use hidden buttons. The buttons are exquisitely designed and inconspicuous, providing a comfortable wearing experience and a more unified appearance, combining practicality and beauty.

Suitable for summer: COOFANDY men's linen shirt is a must-have clothing in summer, its breathability and comfort allow you to stay comfortable in the hot summer, with bright colors and a variety of styles to choose from, suitable for various occasions, such as leisure, outdoor sports, parties, work, vacation, beach, daily appointments, etc.

Professional compression packaging: ensuring the quality and integrity of the shirts without damage. This shirt is machine washable and will not fade easily. Please refer to the size chart information we provide before placing an order. The details page also has model fitting information for reference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Fit Interesting Style
reviews.reviewText: Shirt is soft and feels nice. It fits well but it has weird hidden buttons on front. Just thought it would look a tad better in person but maybe I should have examined longer just not my style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Look and Comfort
reviews.reviewText: I made sure to check out the size chart on this shirt before purchasing because I wanted my shirt to be a bit loose-fitting for warm vacations and summer weather. As a result, I chose the 3x, based on the shoulder measurements (I have broad shoulders), and am really glad I did. The shirt fits great and is very comfortable. The cotton fabric is very soft but still feels rugged, and the style of the shirt is a bit unique with the covered buttons. Laundering is simple; wash on cold, hang to dry. You may choose to iron it for a more crisp look, but I actually prefer the look from a simple line dry. It looks casual and feels casual, but slightly different. I will be trying this one is a few more colors, I think.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shirt may appear as nothing exceptional. What it is, however, is a great example of taking a basic concept, and making it feel quality without all the added costs associated with manual stitching. The principal features of this shirt would be the fabric texture and the fabric that sits over the buttons. These do a great job of creating a unique looking shirt. The fabric is a nice light feel without feeling overly stretchy. This is a great shirt to wear anytime even on a hot day. Typically, a shirt with the button cover design might push the cost into a range that would be from a designer rack. This shirt falls into a nice price range that you wouldn't feel obligated to only wear it for special occasions. Win /Win for cost, design and comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Linen Shirt
reviews.reviewText: I really like this shirt. It is a light weight linen material and has a rich green color and a nice feel. I would imagine it will be very comfortable on a hot summer day. It is very stylish and I especially like the solid placket with hidden buttons. I also like that, even though this is a 3XL, the sleeves are not too long (staying above my elbow). That said, I usually wear a 2XL, and I couldn't take it any tighter through the mid section, even though this shirt is a 3XL. So you may want to consider that if you don't have a slim physique. I will be very careful how I wash this shirt to (hopefully) avoid shrinking. Overall, I really like this shirt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I usually love all that is Coofandy, but this one is not for me.The material is nice, light, and stretchy, but is very wrinkly. In fact the collar has this weird kink in it that I just can’t get rid of, even with ironing. It sticks out and upwards.The fit is weird on me. Makes my belly look bigger than it actually is, and the back seems to billow outwards at the same time. The combination of this makes me look kinda round, lol.Not for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A quite comfortable short-sleeved shirt.
reviews.reviewText: I put this on, and it fit me alllllmost perfectly. Everything fit just right except the left sleeve tugged at my biceps when I turned my body to the right. Not an uncomfortable tug, but noticeable.I like the fabric, it is cool and is soft to the touch. The shirt looks like dress-up but feels more like casual.The only odd thing, which my Chinese wife said is typical in China, is that the buttons on the front, once buttoned up, are hidden behind cloth. On every button-up shirt I have ever worn previously, the buttons show through the button holes once the shirt is buttoned up. In this case, the buttons and the buttonholes are hidden behind a flap of shirt material. Actually, kind of classy and a nicer overall look, I think.The material is not heavy duty, like a full cotton shirt it, but I think this will hold up for plenty of washing cycles.This one is a new style product, and I think it's a keeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have 5 shirts from Coofandy and I love them all. I can order one and know it’s going to fit me perfectly. And they are all very nice looking shirts. The quality of the fabric and stitching are also very good. At 5’10” 175lbs I wear a medium. I would recommend this shirt to anyone. Highly recommended.My guideline for review ratings:⭐️1 star - Not recommended because of poor quality or bad design.⭐️⭐️ 2 stars - Multiple problems or it’s overpriced. Would not buy again.⭐️⭐️⭐️ 3 stars - Product is OK but it has some problems.⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 4 stars - Product is good and description is accurate. Price is within reason.⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 5 stars - Awesome. Would not hesitate to recommend. Price to value ratio is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cool shirt needs some TLC to remain cool, but it's worth it!
reviews.reviewText: My normal summer attire is not complete without a nice, cool shirt to beat the summer heat. Most of my Aloha Shirts are made of rayon, and it appears that this shirt has a form of rayon with other textiles. This will require line drying, unless you want the shirt to shrink and look terrible. It feels great!I knocked a star off, there was a chemical odor when I got the shirt out of the bag, but I'm sure they had their reasons, probably to prevent pests or mold?
